item.title: Race & Space
item.description: /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } An aspect of racial segregation that we want to analyze is segregation related to spatial arrangement. Spatial segregation of Black Americans was enforced in the American South with numerous local and state laws known as the Jim Crow laws from late 19th century to early 20th century.
